title: Jamaica Plain Room Available Sept. 1st
posting_body: One unfurnished room available in 4 bedroom, 1 bathroom first-floor apartment in Jamaica Plain.
Nice quiet neighborhood, very close to Centre St. Twelve-month lease starting September 1st.
Looking for one person (no couples) who can take over the 12 month lease from September 1.
The 3 roommates are men in their twenties, working and/or in school, all renewing their leases September 1.
Peaceful, mature roommates who all get along well, no drama.
The 4th roommate is moving for work and can't stay in JP.
Coin-op washer and dryer in basement.
Ten-minute walk to Green Street Orange Line station.
Rent is $750/month, not including utilities—they average $50/per person/per month.
Landlord pays garbage and hot water.
Send text or email for more info.
